original_text: Eli was sitting on his chair by the side of the road in Shiloh. He was waiting for news of the battle. He wanted to know if God's Covenant Box was safe. When the soldier arrived in the city, he told the people what had happened in the battle. All the people started to cry loudly.
korean_text: 그가 이를 때는 엘리가 길 옆 자기의 의자에 앉아 기다리며 그의 마음이 하나님의 궤로 말미암아 떨릴 즈음이라 그 사람이 성읍에 들어오며 알리매 온 성읍이 부르짖는지라
